actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Packwood favorably with amendments. With written report No. 97-64.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 90.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1982 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation with amendment, S. Rept. 97-64) Authorizes appropriations for fiscal year 1982 for certain Department of Commerce maritime programs including: (1) operating-differential subsidy payments; (2) research and development; (3) reserve fleet expenses; (4) maritime education; and (5) operations and training. Authorizes supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1982 for employee benefits. Amends the Merchant Marine Act of 1936, to include as "eligible vessels" certain vessels that were reconstructed or reconditioned outside of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1982 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce, and for other purposes.
